attributes.action: make the treatment for Cockayne Syndrome available on the N.H.S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make the treatment for Cockayne Syndrome available on the N.H.S one family has spent £28000  for their child to get
treatment in the u.s.a  this is morally wrong every British Subject has the right to free health care under 1946 health act,and more to the point the RIGHT TO LIVE  more children are being diagnosed with this illness and life expectancy is 7 yrs.With treatment
this increase greatly  and  quality of life improves dramaticley HELP THEM BEFORE ITS TOO LATE

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make the treatment for Cockayne Syndrome available on the N.H.S."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17451


Prime Minister's Office
